thread.title: Anti-Semite David Duke Endorses Keith Ellison for DNC Chair
thread.title_full: Anti-Semite David Duke Endorses Keith Ellison for DNC Chair

author: Davis
title: Anti-Semite David Duke Endorses Keith Ellison for DNC Chair
text:
WATCH: Ted Cruz Reminds Viewers That The KKK Was Founded by Democrats 
The “he knows” comment is a likely reference to allegations that Ellison , the first Muslim member of Congress, had defended people who made disparaging remarks about Israel and Jews, and was associated with the Nation of Islam for a period of time. Keith Ellison, Sally Boynton Brown or Jehmu Greene would all be excellent choices – I really like Keith though… I mean, at least he knows. https://t.co/jXQK1CJEie 
— David Duke (@DrDavidDuke) February 12, 2017 
So an anti-Semite just endorsed another potential anti-Semite to run one of the largest political parties in America, and the media is too busy quoting “anonymous sources” about alleged ties between Russia and the Trump campaign staff to even bother reporting it. Advertisement - story continues below 
That’s journalism at its finest, folks. 
Remember when Duke endorsed Trump, and the media jumped all over Trump for not disavowing him immediately? Think they’ll do the same thing to Ellison? 
Twitchy noted that several people reacted to this endorsement on Twitter, asking why the media wasn’t covering this shocking news. I expect these endorsements to be covered extensively by the media. https://t.co/kKs5VoCvVd 
— Amanda Prestigiacomo (@AmandaPresto) February 13, 2017 Advertisement - story continues below Trending Stories
